title: SGen task does not support publicsign
body: This leaves no way to integrate SGen with an assembly using public signing.

nodes.body:
Closing this issue. It seems that SGen provided by .NETFramework does not support the publicsign property, only Mono's does.

The alternative is to use the [Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator) nuget package.
